Translations.Text: Amadera ilaha ekaka ilaha. Anantara yara parajibane bisbasa kare na, tadera antara satyabimukha ebam tara ahankara pradarsana kareche.
Nihsandehe allaha tadera gopana o prakasya yabatiya bisaye abagata. Niscita'i tini ahankaridera pachanda karena na.
Yakhana taderake bala hayah tomadera palanakarta ki nayila karechena? Tara baleh purbabartidera kisasa-kahini.
Phale keyamatera dina ora purnamatraya bahana karabe odera papabhara ebam papabhara tadera'o yaderake tara tadera ajnatahetu bipathagami kare sune na'o, khuba'i nikrsta bojha ya tara bahana kare.
